Class ScoreManager

java.lang.Object
com.comp2042.tetris.model.score.ScoreManager
public final class ScoreManager extends Object
Manages score calculations and publishes score change events. This class coordinates between the Score model, the scoring policy, and the event system to handle all score-related operations.

Score points are awarded for:

  • Soft dropping bricks (moving down manually)
  • Clearing lines (with bonuses for multiple lines)
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • ScoreManager

      public ScoreManager(Score score, GameEventPublisher eventPublisher, ScorePolicy scorePolicy)
      Constructs a ScoreManager with the given dependencies.
      Parameters:
      score - the score model to update
      eventPublisher - the publisher for score change events
      scorePolicy - the policy for calculating score values
      Throws:
      NullPointerException - if any parameter is null
